Get KenPom's coaching resume data

Source: R/kp_historical_tables.R
kp_coach_history.Rd

Get KenPom's coaching resume data

kp_coach_history(coach)

Arguments

coach

Coach filter to select.

Value

A data frame with 30 columns:

Year

double.

Team.Rk

double.

Team

character.

Coach

character.

Conf

character.

W-L

character.

AdjT

double.

AdjO

double.

AdjD

double.

Off.eFG.Pct

double.

Off.TO.Pct

double.

Off.OR.Pct

double.

Off.FTRate

double.

Off.FG_2.Pct

double.

Off.FG_3.Pct

double.

Off.FT.Pct

double.

Off.FG_3A.Pct

double.

Off.A.Pct

double.

Off.APL

double.

Def.eFG.Pct

double.

Def.TO.Pct

double.

Def.OR.Pct

double.

Def.FTRate

double.

Def.FG_2.Pct

double.

Def.FG_3.Pct

double.

Def.Blk.Pct

double.

Def.FG_3A.Pct

double.

Def.A.Pct

double.

Def.AP

double.

Foul2Partic.Pct

double.

Examples

  # \donttest{
   try(kp_coach_history(coach = 'Leonard Hamilton'))
